item.description:
Come and learn the magickal art of wand making!

This class will start on a lecture of the history of wand making, the different styles and types of wands, the correspondences of the various wood and stones for the making of wands, and how to dedicate and charge your own magickal wand.

After the lecture and break, everyone will be able to make their own wand with all materials supplied: wood for the wands, crystals, semi-precious gem stones, feathers, leather, wire and glue. We will then charge and dedicate them together.

This class is $25.00 per person: $15 for the class, $10 for materials, which includes all wand materials and paperwork. Cash and checks are accepted, paypal is available upon request.
item.how_to_find_us: Please park next door at the Copper Stallion and come in the front door of Cornerstone!
item.name: The Art of Wand Making
